replies.body: I spent 80$ on openning the new chest, and I don't even get one single gemstone

You should only buy the pass which comes with 1 gemstone, then keep playing to get tickets and use the tickets to unlock "good" orbs. Orbs aren't much different from ordinary chests in terms of gemstone mining. Don't waste money except if you are streamers.
Same happened to me, and the skins I got were nothing to be excited about either...
